description.default: The environment URL of the current environment. This will be added to the flow session trace table during processing. Found in aka.ms/ppac or session details. Example " https://automation.crm.dynamics.com/"

label.description: The environment URL of the current environment. This will be added to the flow session trace table during processing. Found in aka.ms/ppac or session details. Example " https://automation.crm.dynamics.com/"
